full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 196 of 228 872 LC2VMAX6 Alessi - Direct
1 Q. Okay. So two inches, I don't know if you can see this far, but that's about two inches; correct?
2 A. That's correct.
3 Q. And the Exhibit 52 is maybe a quarter of an inch, is that a fair statement?
4 A. It's fair.
5 Q. Okay. The books that you were talking about, as I understand it, came from New York; is that right?
6 A. Yes.
7 Q. Okay. And you don't have any idea whether that book -- well, whether Exhibit 52 -- let's just call it Exhibit 52, came from New York or not; correct? You don't know whether Exhibit 52 came from New York, came from Palm Beach, came from California, came from anywhere? I mean, you have no personal knowledge about where Exhibit 52 was created; correct?
8 A. Excuse me. This is Exhibit 52?
9 Q. Yes, that's correct.
10 A. Yeah, I have no idea.
11 Q. Okay. There are -- when you held that up, I can see a bunch of different Post-It notes in Exhibit 52. Do you see that?
12 A. Yes.
13 Q. Okay. You have no idea where those Post-It notes came from; correct?
14 A. Correct.
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018069
